data.title: University of Michigan Athletics
data.meta_description: Alex Knight - Senior (2017-18) • Named ITA All-American (June 1, 2018) • Ranked as high as No. 3 by the ITA in singles, while being ranked as high as No. 7 i...
data.text:
Senior (2017-18)

• Named ITA All-American (June 1, 2018)

• Ranked as high as No. 3 by the ITA in singles, while being ranked as high as No. 7 in doubles alongside Runhao Hua.

• 2018 NCAA Individual Championships Qualifier (Singles & Doubles)

• Named unanimous Big Ten First Team All-Conference

• Named ITA Most Improved Senior and Most Improved Midwest Senior

• Big Ten Athlete of the Week (Jan. 30, 2018)

• Runner-up for the 2017 singles title at the ITA Midwest Regional Championships (Oct. 23, 2017)

• 2017 ITA Fall National Championship Consolation Winner

• Runner-up for the 2017 doubles title at the ITA Midwest Regional Championships alongside Hua (Oct. 23, 2017)

• Served as co-captain alongside Davis Crocker

Junior (2016-17)

• Named to All-Big Ten First Team

• Academic All-Big Ten

• Compiled a team-leading 25-10 record in singles, leading the team with a 22-4 mark in dual matches - primarily playing at No. 2 (11-2)

• Went 21-6 in doubles play, while recording a 16-4 mark alongside Runhao Hua, primarily at No. 2 (14-3)

• Climbed as high as No. 86 in the national rankings on May 4

• Ranked as high as No. 28 nationally in doubles with partner Runhao Hua (Feb. 21)

• Went 3-6 in singles action and 4-2 in doubles during the fall season

• Participated in singles qualifying at the ITA All-American

• Earned a No. 82 preseason singles ranking from the ITA

• Defeated South Florida's No. 77-ranked Peter Bertran at No. 3 singles (Feb. 5)

• Beat Columbia's No. 30-ranked Shawn Hadevi/Jackie Tang at No. 2 doubles with partner Runhao Hua (Feb. 11)

Sophomore (2015-16)

• Named to All-Big Ten second team

• Ended the season ranked No. 125 in singles

• Went 16-11 in singles action, including a 15-10 dual-match record

• Played the majority of the season at the top of the lineup, going 3-8 at No. 1 and 9-2 at No. 2

• Won 11 straight singles matches in a row from Jan. 24 to March 3

• Teamed with Runhao Hua at the No. 1 doubles position, going 12-7 in dual matches

Sophomore/Freshman (2014-15)

• Finished 13-16 in singles, mostly at No. 4

• Clinched Michigan's 5-2 win over Wisconsin with a 6-4, 6-2 win at No. 4

• Picked up a 6-4, 7-6 (3) win over No. 73 Aleks Vukic of Illinois in the ITA Midwest Regional Championship first round

• Finished 11-7 in doubles

Freshman (2013-14)

• Early enrollee. Redshirted

Prep

• Rated as a five-star recruit by tennisrecruiting.net

• Blue-chip prospect and rated as high as No. 5 in the country by tennisrecruiting.net

• Ranked No. 24 nationally, No. 1 in Florida

• 2013 Florida High School Player of the Year

• 2012 and 2013 All-American by the National High School Tennis All-American Foundation

• Finished 52-25 overall, including 15-7 against other five star players

• Michael Krop High School (2014)
